name: Coohom
description: Coohom is a cloud-based platform for creating 3D interior design visualizations and renderings.
longDescription: Coohom is a cloud-based interior design and visualization platform that empowers designers, architects, and homeowners to create stunning 3D renderings and floor plans. Its mission is to simplify and accelerate the interior design process by offering intuitive tools for professionals and enthusiasts alike. The platform leverages AI to enhance design efficiency, enabling users to visualize spaces with photorealistic quality. Coohom serves a global audience, catering to industries like interior design, real estate, and furniture retail. It provides a seamless workflow for creating, customizing, and sharing design projects. The platform’s accessibility and robust features make it a go-to solution for transforming ideas into professional-grade visualizations.
features: Drag-and-drop 3D modeling allows users to create detailed floor plans and furnish spaces effortlessly.
AI-powered rendering generates photorealistic images of interior designs in seconds.
A vast library of 3D furniture and decor models enables customization of designs with real-world products.
Real-time collaboration tools let teams work together on projects from anywhere.
AR and VR visualization options provide immersive previews of designs for clients.
Custom branding features allow businesses to showcase designs with their logos and style.
Cloud-based storage ensures designs are accessible and secure across devices.
Integration with e-commerce platforms enables direct product purchasing from designs.
2D-to-3D conversion transforms basic floor plans into fully realized 3D models.
High-resolution rendering exports deliver professional outputs for presentations and marketing.
User-friendly interface caters to both beginners and professional designers.
Multi-platform support allows access on web, iOS, and Android devices.

faqs.question: What is Coohom used for?
faqs.answer: Coohom is used to create 3D interior design visualizations, floor plans, and renderings for professionals and homeowners.

faqs.question: Does Coohom offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Coohom provides a free plan with limited features, ideal for small projects or trying out the platform.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with others on Coohom?
faqs.answer: Coohom offers real-time collaboration tools, allowing multiple users to work on a project simultaneously.

faqs.question: What types of users benefit from Coohom?
faqs.answer: Interior designers, architects, real estate professionals, and furniture retailers use Coohom to visualize and market spaces.

faqs.question: Does Coohom support VR or AR?
faqs.answer: Yes, Coohom offers AR and VR visualization for immersive design previews.

faqs.question: Can I use my own furniture models in Coohom?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can upload custom 3D models to personalize their designs.

faqs.question: Is Coohom suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Coohom’s intuitive interface makes it accessible for beginners while offering advanced tools for professionals.
